titles.title: Recommending the designation of the first Wednesday of December as "Government Customer Service Day".
Recommending the designation of the first Wednesday of December as "Government Customer Service Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Encourages: (1) the executive branch to find innovative ways to instill a culture of customer centered service, and (2) each agency to recognize employees who deliver outstanding levels of service to the public.
